plays.text: Penalty to Wes Walz 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Owen Nolan

Penalty to Mike Ricci 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Dwayne Roloson
Penalty to Matt Johnson 2 minutes for Roughing Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Darby Hendrickson 2 minutes for Roughing Vincent Damphousse
